system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.u5uPp2qYPln7aoOz]{Psiblade Proficiency} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.M1Cbm2LJqmpzRAFq]{Plasma Blade Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.MHXQ6uBfaRCgUfgW]{Basic Offensive Form}

Benefits

A character gains a +4 attack bonus to all Called Shot attacks against arms and legs made when attacking with a psiblade or plasblade. The character may also make non-lethal attacks with the psiblade or plasblade at a -2 attack penalty. Also, when attacking an object, the character gains a +2 attack bonus and ignores 1 point of hardness.

Normal

Non-lethal attacks have an attack penalty of -4.
system.summary: +4 Called Shot bonus, reduce NL attack penalty, sunder bonus
